assessmentItem.title: 9. E A conflict between two guests
assessmentItem.label: 15. A conflict between two guests

div.h4: Eva and Curt live next to each other. Curt thinks Eva and her children make too much noise. Eva, on the other hand, thinks that Curt is angry all the time. Your task as a campsite manager is to come up with ideas to solve the conflict between the two guests. You are taking part in a brainstorm with Jack and Jill.
div.h6:
Write in the field at the bottom. Hit 'Enter' each time you have written an idea.
While you write, you can see Jack and Jill's ideas on the screen. Click on the text in the large area when you are ready to begin. Continue to the next task when you cannot come up with more ideas. The brainstorm will stop automatically after 3 minutes.
